name: q
description: name: Edi Ekeng How to run:     1. Naviagate to the directory in the terminal which the files are located "A4".     2. Use these commands in the terminal in order;         a. npm init         b. npm i express          c. npm i pug         d. npm i mongo         e. npm i mongoose         f. npm i path         g. npm i faker         h. mkdir database (makes the database)         i. mongod --dbpath=database (starts the database)     3. run node database-initializer.js     4. run node server.js     5. copy the link displayed in the terminal and paste it in your browser of choice. Files included:     1. README.txt     2. database-initializer.js     3. server.js     4. Public         a. add.pug         b. remove.pug         c. style.css         d. orderform.js         e. orderform.html     5. views         a. home.pug         b. login.pug         c. registration.pug         d. user.pug         e. profile.pug         f. order_summery.pug         g. partials             i. header_in.pug             ii. header_out.pug
